title: @Riot we need more old people champions
body:
Swain doesn't count the man is a badass in his early fifties, xerath doesn't count because he'll be an youthful arrogant arcane douche forever, skarner isn't a person, etc

we need some wise old crone or mystic or just a really old dude who likes killing things etc

our characters cannot all be muscly men in their prime or young buxom women, nor can they all be weird million year old monsters

riot pls

replies.body: An old hag that scorns all the peeps to get off her ~~lawn~~ lane would be amazing

zilean. there are basically 2 types of old people you could have though, magic users and cyborgs. other old people are old and useless, all they do is sleep, criticise the modern generation and %%%% their pants cause they can't control half their body.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QnOtYNPY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T13:30:34.115+0000)
>
> zilean. there are basically 2 types of old people you could have though, magic users and cyborgs. other old people are old and useless, all they do is sleep, criticise the modern generation and %%%% their pants cause they can't control half their body.

I would disagree, to be honest. In a lot of fantasy stories there are weapon masters in their 80s who have taken great care of themselves and can still fight like bosses. Yeah, I agree it is a little realistic (although it is possible for people to be super fit in old age), but so is 90% of stuff in the game.

I'd like to see an old lady type champ, maybe some form of traditional witch who actually uses a cauldron. Maybe like Viktor and she can bring specific ingredients to have different effects (like poison, burn, maybe even a stun)
